stories.text:
Hi everybody, we've launched a free service to screen job positions and not waste your time in useless interviews. The service allows the user to creates different questionnaires and share one of them to the recruiters. You can find the service at https://breves.it/?campaign=hn

I've wrote this post in order to have feedbacks, please write your opinion, what can be improved, what do you expect from a service like this.

Thank you
stories.title: Show HN: Breves – a free service to screen job positions and not waste your time

stories.text:
I often observe publications on Reddit or Twitter about the limited access to alpha/beta users of some applications. I found it is very common in the game industry. But some websites also don't give you direct access, they ask you to apply to get early access.
What can be the reason for that? Are there any benefits of closed alpha/beta testing over public access for early adopters?
stories.title: Q: The purpose of closed alpha/beta testing
